content.detailedDescription: I went to meet my friend at his house after a soccer game at about noon on a sunday.  it was a nice clear and warm day so i went out on his patio at the back of the house to wait for him.  the patio looks over the canal and the mountains on the other side of the water.  i noticed what i thought was a flock of birds over the water but then quickly realized they were too far away to be birds.  i thought maybe they were planes but they didn't look like planes or make any sound.  their were about 15 objects that were against the green mountains and then they went in front of the snow caps on the mountains and i could tell they weren't planes or helicopters or birds, they were just solid objects that made no sound.  i watched them for as long as i could and then they were out of my site.  they would have been travelling north towards mt klitsa.  i've attached a photo of what i saw looking against the snow cap mountains.
content.summary: Saw what appeared to be a flock of birds over the water but realized was too far away

content.detailedDescription: I went to meet my friend at his house after a soccer game at about noon on a sunday.  it was a nice clear and warm day so i went out on his patio at the back of the house to wait for him.  the patio looks over the canal and the mountains on the other side of the water.  i noticed what i thought was a flock of birds over the water but then quickly realized they were too far away to be birds.  i thought maybe they were planes but they didn't look like planes or make any sound.  their were about 15 objects that were against the green mountains and then they went in front of the snow caps on the mountains and i could tell they weren't planes or helicopters or birds, they were just solid objects that made no sound.  i watched them for as long as i could and then they were out of my site.  they would have been travelling north towards mt klitsa.  i've attached a photo of what i saw looking against the snow cap mountains.
content.summary: Saw what appeared to be a flock of birds over the water but realized was too far away

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home on the skytrain when i just felt like i had to get off and walk across the train bridge which has a pathway under it. as i always do when im out late i look at the stars and all that stuff. i was about a 3rd of the way across when i noticed a small star like red object moving erraticly at 10:33pm. after a few seonds it dissapeared. at first i thought nothing of it, a few minutes later at 10:41pm i saw an intensly bright white light appear then dissapear. then a few minutes after that at 10:53pm i saw what i believed to be a sattilite, but the odd thing about the sattilite type thing is that it soon became intensly bright just like the event before this then discharged a red object like the first event then dimmed out to much dimmer than it was origionally then dissapeared.
content.summary: A dull red object moving erraticly

content.detailedDescription: Approx 11:30pm i went into my backyard and saw a very large orange light in the sky,i called inside to a friend and he came out and saw it.I went inside to find my video camera and when i went back outside my neighbors were also out in the front of my house looking at a second simliar object following the same course the first one went. both objects were observed by myself and 5 others.It made no sounds and it was like nothing i ever saw before !!!!
content.summary: Me and 5 other people saw 2 objects approx 2 min apart and go east to west!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside with my wife,daughter and a couple of friends looking up at the stars when we both observed what we thought to be a star with the exception that the object was moving.  as we watched it, it continued to travel in a straight and level path.  after about three minutes the light got very bright and the object disappeared.  about five minutes later we observed a second object do the exact same thing.  these objects were on a consistent path with a previous reported sighting around the first of july.
content.summary: Bright star like object that was traveling east ward.  had a steady emission of light and then suddenly the object got very bright and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was out this night at 11pm eastern and observed 6 to 8 small objects in the western sky no sound but were glowing red to orange and exibited interesting patterns of movement to high in the sky to be helicopters but flying to slow to be jets in my opinion the event lasted for maybe about an hour. the weather here that night was cloudy with a breeze of 10 to 15 mph. i checked with the news services here and it looks like this event went unreported.Thank you
content.summary: Glowing spheres in cny

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i hope i not seeing things now this is my second bright star like object i seen zip by this time no flash of light. 
i was looking at the night sky again coming from walking my dog again i saw a plane which i knew was one since it was blinking and flying then i notice a white bright like star zip past it the plane was higher up then the star like object it passed underneath going in a west/north direction once again i tried to video it with my phone but as soon as i tried it just disappered.I know what planes and helicopters,jets or shooting stars look like this was not either one of them...
content.summary: 2nd bright like star within a week

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i hope i not seeing things now this is my second bright star like object i seen zip by this time no flash of light. 
i was looking at the night sky again coming from walking my dog again i saw a plane which i knew was one since it was blinking and flying then i notice a white bright like star zip past it the plane was higher up then the star like object it passed underneath going in a west/north direction once again i tried to video it with my phone but as soon as i tried it just disappered.I know what planes and helicopters,jets or shooting stars look like this was not either one of them...
content.summary: 2nd bright like star within a week

content.detailedDescription: So my roommate and girlfriend went out for a cigarette and started looking at stars around 9 pm.  i noticed one that was unusual.  at first i thought it might be a planet within sight, although i don't really keep track of planetary movement, i know that sometimes mars and venus are visible, and can appear red and blue.  this starlike object seemed to be rapidly pulsing or strobing, mostly white, but i also noticed very distinct pulses of red and blue.  it was happening extremely fast, the distinction of colors was very difficult if you weren't watching intensely but the strobing effect was very obvious in general when compared to visible stars in other directions.  we came back in and started googling, searching for similar reports or an explantion.  after about an hour or two, we went out to see if it was still there.  in the same direction, we noticed more of these "stars" blinking in the same fashion.  it seemed like there were anywhere from 7-10 + of them of varying brightness, although they all displayed the same strobing characteristics.  my gf noted that some of them seemed to move, even if only slightly.  i can't say for sure that i noticed this, but i can definitely not say for sure that they didn't.  i can't say that there was any more significant movement than the normal slow path of celestial objects during the course of the evening.  it was difficult at times to see all of them with them being faint, and some streetlight interference.  being the skeptic that i am, i can only assume that it may have something to do with smog and general air pollution in the air over atlanta (south of my location) causing a visual effect.  i naturally want to find a scientific explanation here but until i do, i thought this was significant enough to post.  most noteworthy for me, was the brilliant color.  the red and blue were exactly the "red" and "blue" from a crayola crayon box.  i am 100% sure that these were not planes.  living near several airports over the last years, i have seen more than my fair share of planes, helicopters, and even military aircraft.  as of the time of report.  the objects have not disappeared.  i will continue to look for them on clear evenings in the same direction(south of marietta / kennesaw).
content.summary: Star-like objects south of kennesaw, seemed to maybe be hovering over the atlanta area.

content.detailedDescription: 1.Stepped outside to see how hot it was.2.Just happened to look up as there was a plane going over head,i live less than 5 miles from midway airport.3.I saw a plane heading east and i saw just behind and somewhat below,four dim lights heading east the front 2 and the back 2 were flying offset to one another heading east they then started to twist as they flew like a dna  strand.Then i lost them in the glare of the city lights.
content.summary: Four small star like lite

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our way to a friends house. he was looking up at the sky and said, "look baby, a ufo.", we parked the car so i could get a better look. i got out my cell phone to take a picture, and as soon as i got out of the car and pointed my phone at the ufo it disappeared. a few minutes after we saw a blinking red light and what appeared to be 2 jets. i didn't believe in aliens until last night. we live on a back road, and its normally people out in the middle of nowhere that get abducted, i'm a little afraid that is going to happen to us.
content.summary: Four lights in a row

content.detailedDescription: My fiance had gone to the store, and when he came home, he was all excited saying i "just had" to go outside and see these two weird clouds and the crazy silent lighting in them!  there were other clouds and some light haze, the usual color of that dirty brownish-pink/purple/orange of nighttime city clouds.  but there were two large, softly rounded clouds that were a bright silvery-whitish blue--they appeared almost to be lit from within.  then we saw this brilliant burst---not a flash, a burst--of lighting.  it reminded me of the lighting seen in this video on youtube of a pyramid ufo and crazy lightning in the sky over taiwan!  we walked out to this gravel pit near our apartment complex (which is out in the country sort of...We get lots of skywatching in, as light pollution isn't so bad out here).  when we got there, there was another burst of lightning in the glowing blue clouds.  we had a completely un-obstructed view of the sky a-la planetarium style.  the clouds were in the wnw.  as we looked around, watching about 5-6 different "stars" that were flashing rainbow colors very brightly and very rapidly, we both witnessed a brilliantly bright white starlike object form.  it grew brighter and larger, then began to move towards the blue-glowing clouds in the wnw.  as it moved, the starlike object got smaller and faded--this was very rapid (in a matter of maybe 10 seconds,it had moved maybe 90 degrees across the sky).  we looked back towards the clouds, and saw the rainbow sparkling objects were seeming to almost exchange places, revolving around some unseen center point, they circled one higher, one lower--they had previously been almost in a horizontally level line with each other.  another of the rainbow flashers started moving off across the sky to nw.  we saw some blinking flying objects that might have been airplanes except that they weren't properly lit for navigation identification purposes and they were totally silent.  one airplane did pass overhead at the end of the event--proper navigation lighting (red light on the left wing, green on the right, white in the center and the tail) and the doppler effect soundwaves  properly matched the airplane's movement/distances.  during this event, there were strong, cooling breezes around me and my fiance, but only trees in our immediate vicinity were affected--trees that were only 30-50 feet away were completely still.  this "wind" seemed to move diagonally towards us from the direction of the sky.  we were both psychologically washed with a sense of gratitude, awe, wonder, and many other such gentle feelings.  it was very beautiful and we both felt like we'd been targeted to have this experience shared with us!  it felt like whatever it was, it was intelligent, benevolent, comforting and friendly. i had tried to use my digital camera to record some of this event, but it's a piece of crap and so i got darkness and me and my fiance talking. but we'll never forget what we saw!  this is not our first ufo rodeo (as the saying goes).  we've seen many many things together, as well as on our own.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Oddly inner-illuminated clouds with silent ball lighting of various colors, followed by  multicolored starlike objects  moving slowly and trading places in their sky placement and sudden appearance of brighter/bigger-than-venus/jupiter white ball of light

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from cherokee heading back to sylva.  we were driving on highway 441, when we came to the intersection of camp creek road.  i noticed three large red-orange orbs hovering over the field in a triangle shape.  i pointed in out to the person in the car with me and she saw them too.  she said they were probably attached to a powerline, but being comfortable with the area i was fairly sure that there are no powerlines that run through the area.  i turned around on the highway and turned down camp creek road.  we could see two of the orbs that were slowly moving up into the sky away from us until they became so small that we could not see them anymore.  we were unable to see the third one.  i drove back down to the highway, drove back towards cherokee, turned around at the bel-air motel and drove back towards camp creek road.  this time we could see the third orb.  we turned down camp creek road and drove out towards the orb as it slowly moved in the same direction as the other two did.  eventually we could no longer see the last orb.  i drove around the area trying to find something that would explain what we had witnessed, but was unable to find anything.  the lights did not flash like i have seen on planes and choppers.  there was not sound either.
content.summary: Three large red-orange orbs that hovered in triangle shape and then slowly ascended into the sky away from us.

content.detailedDescription: Could not sleep, went out side on my patio to observe stars and constellations.  was watching the area around orion, when i saw what i thought was a star, suddenly get bright gold in color.  this "star" then did something which defied gravity, logic and reality...It started to slowly move north northeast, then sped up, made a nearly 90 degree angle turn, then slowly got dim and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Previously dim gold orb, gets bright, moves, makes 90 degree turn then goes dim...

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving north on a residential street in bartlesville, oklahoma.
2. i was already looking up and north, a collection of white flashes came into view
3. to answer the question i thought it to be a ufo. 
4. above me and extremely high i saw 15-18 flashing white orbs never breaking formation
     race due north.  they flashed at the same rate but independantly. 
     when they were "on" it was white and brightly lit.  when "off" there was nothing to see. 
     i could tell it was higher than one would be able to say a passenger airplane flies. 
     the formation occupied most of the view of the sky and the orbs themselves were
     extremely in size.  the array was diamond shaped but really in one row there was one
     orb; the next row had two orbs; the next row had three; the next row five; 7; 5; 3; 2.
 
5.  i was thrilled and called everyone i knew, to this day i talk about it. 
6.  the sight lasted 10-20 seconds, it disappeared beyond the treeline horizon. 

7.  there are two other witnesses and we were not together. 
8.  i would be happy to sketch it or have it animated.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: *18 flashing white orbs in bowling pin array (reflected) high speed same rate of flashing though no pattern.

content.detailedDescription: I have reported this and have been contacted by a man in mount pleasnt tx but he says he is only able to take care of events in texas he says i need a investigator from oklahoma. i can show this investigator any clear night from approx 9pm till 11:15 pm as that is the only time i see them. i need someone to come and see for themselves what i am seeing. i have been watching these since 1993 and have seen rare events take place. i have seen them in west texas east tx north tx oklahoma floridathese are not airplanes nor are they satalites. planes do not do what these are doing. if you need to call me to set up a viewing please do so,i im in a dead spot for cell phone but my roomy can get cell phone service better than i can. i am in boswell oklahoma his phone number is 9034217388 ask for wayne. you will also be impressed as to what i can show you. i never play games. you will have to see for yourselves.
content.summary: *star like objects

content.detailedDescription: While working in my back yard i noticed a helicopter approaching very low and very slow, not unusual i live near a municipal airport and see lots of aircraft. this `copter was different, all black with no markings even the glass was blacked out. it circled my neighbourhood for about a minute until it disappeared to the south. still looking upward, i noticed 2 metalic orbs about 500 ft. above me and they were dancing! bobbing up and down and circling one another. this went on for about 90 seconds until out of nowhere the `copter returned at full speed headed right towards the orbs. they ( the orbs ) stopped dancing, came together and took off to the west at a very high rate of speed, helicopter in full pursuit! i thought : good luck trying to catch them ! something very strange is going on.
content.summary: 2 orbs chased by black helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
On june 26th 2011 at approxamately 2230hrs i was sitting on my back porch in portland or. enjoying a rare nice evening this year.  i observed 2 bright red orange lites that at first appeared to be suspended in the sky directly west of my location one above the other. at first i thought it was aircraft on approach to pdx located about a mile north of my location until i realized that the lights were not blinking and were really too bright to be aircraft lights. my next thought was that some fool had fired off parachute flares over a densely populated area until i realized that the lights were not suspended but were actually coming directly toward me from due west. i then thought that maybe they were military helocoptors as they appeared to actually be decending one in trail of the other similar to low bird / high bird cover tactics used in the vietman war. however as i continued to observe the lights changed direction in a gradual turn to a south easterly heading and the shape of the lights changed from a sphirical shape to an i shape  as they passed to my south at what appeared now to be at extremely high altitude. as i watched the heading of the lights became more southerly until they faded and i could no longer see them. there was absolutely no sound. approxamately ten minutes later i observed a third bright red lead colored light in the same location in the sky that i had first seen the earlier lights. this time i had binoculars and was able to see clearly that what i was watching was actually a cone of light that had some sort of a craft at its apex that was cigar or missle shaped and very bright silver colored. the cone of light trailing behind apeared to be ten to twenty times longer than the craft at its apex. i'm a retired fire fighter and have a fire science degree. the cone did not appear to be any form of combustion but appeared more like ionizing gas that was lumenesing not burning. this third object followed the same flight pattern as the first two and faded as it proceeded south on a south eastern heading. again i heard no sound. i do not know what i saw, but i know that what ever they were they were flying mighty high and mighty fast. 
the elapsed time from when i first observed the lights until they faded was only 50 to 120 seconds and they covered a large portion of the sky in this short time. i believe that what i saw were three space craft entering the earth's atmosphere. my best guess is that we have a military space program. a thought i've had is that groom lake is south east of portland oregon.
content.summary: Observed three bright red orange  lights that i believe were craft entering earth's atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: Watching off my front deck over the forest a white tubes passes close by and then i get a overwhelming feeling that they are uncloaking themselves strickly so i could see them. weird! live real close to pine bush ny.
content.summary: White tube 40 ft long 8-9 ft tall, flate ends,no windows, nomotors,no lights

content.detailedDescription:
Let my dog out to go to the bathroom and i noticed how clear the sky was. i noticed a bright object in the sky whic i thought at first was a star then it seemed to have tenticles drop from the mai main body. it changed color, changed shape and made the "tenticles" appear and disappear frequently.
i was very happy, not concerned for my safety  which i find odd.
content.shape: Cigar,   Cross,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Other
content.summary: In the sky as a star then changed shape and color

content.detailedDescription: Having drinks on beach deck crown plaza hotel observed two bright orange orbs hovering on easter horizon.Thought at first mast on ship or stationary platform. objects climed about 5 deg of arc remained stationary and hovered on horizon for about five to ten mins.To my surprise the locals and waitress were very excieted . single orb appeared in same area aprox two hours later climbed about 20 deg of arc blinking in and out at about a six second duration for about five mins. no planets at that position way to bright for landing lights. i am a mufon member,private pilot, amateur astronomer and had never observed any aerial phenonmena like this before just would like to know if there were any other sightings at this time in this area.
content.summary: Very bright orange orbs

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside and noticed some lights flashing over the butler valley east of here. not to unusual because i see alot of military flying over this area all the time. military jets are always flying over almost daily. at first i thought it was flares that they shoot. i have seen flares shot on a regular basis and know them when i see them. there was a lighting storm moving from the southwest to the northeast last night over the butler valley. the lighting was fair sense i got phx lighting the clouds up. the ceiling was very high last night. these lights were well below the clouds. as i sat there and watched i noticed how the lights would turn on then off in a instant. when they turned back on they were in a different spot. i watched for 5 minutes about then they stopped. the lights were there for the whole 5 minutes. butler valley gets all sorts of military activity because no one hardly is out there. it is also the sight of the old camp bouse used during ww2. i've spotted a-10,c-130 black heli's and numerous figher jets in that area as i explore it. it is got a aura to it out there where i never feel alone. i just wonder if it was a ufo, if it was trying to get power from the storm or if the military is crazy enough to fly billion dollar planes into a massive lightning storm like that?  1. i was in bouse az
                                    2. bouse is very dark                    
                                       lights catch the eye  3.                                  3. military flares                 
                                    4.Round orangeish red balls in one spot 
                                      then gone. when reappeared it was in 
                                      a different spot
                                    5. wow
                                    6. it was just gone all of a sudden
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Numerous light turning off and on at different spots in sky

content.detailedDescription: On july 3rd , 2011 my family and i were outside getting ready to light some fireworks . my wife said ; " hun what are those " ? i looked up and saw a line of what looked like what to be a group of four objects flying in group formation heading east to west . they where bell shaped with an red orange light that swirled around the bottom . it seemed odd to me because i'm an avid aircraft fan , i havent ever seen anything like it . but then there came another , and another ,and another . there were about 15-20 , approx. 4 - 8 miles in the sky...They were moving what seemed to be too slow for an object that didnt have any wings to sustain flight !  when they passed over us it was even stranger because there were no rear thrusters and when it passed their was no light just the dark objects they continued their path and then were gone one by one as if they were playing follow the leader. i was still in awe when i realized that they didn't disappear from the horizon that were just gone... i was excited , i was frightened , and i was very very curious. i called selfridge air national guard base, michigan , i asked the public liason , person if there was an air show or if they had anything as far as manouvers that day because of the fourth...He said there wasn't...I still have questions !
content.summary: Out on front porch with family and all saw objects that didnt resemble modern aircraft coming one after other approx 15 to 20

content.detailedDescription: On july 4 2011 about 10:30 me my fieance and 2 kids and cousin was watching the fireworks in muncie in. my fieance was recording the fireworks when i noticed a orange ball of light coming towards where the fireworks was going off i thought that was wierd seemed that would be very dangerous to fly so close to the fireworks the light seemed to pause just befor the spot where the fireworks was going off then seemed to fly through the spot where the fireworks was going off.I told my fiance to try and get the light on tape but when she looked at the little view screen on camera you couldnt see the light but we could see it with our eyes so we wasnt sure if we got it on tape or not.I was real busy the next day so i didnt get to review the sd card out of the camera but i was telling a buddy about what we saw and he thought i was crazy becouse there was couple hundred people there and we didnt hear of anybody else that saw it so i said lets review the sd card and see if we cought anything.When we watched the film i was stunned we did catch the orange light and what seems to me a ghostly face and a small flashing light that i didnt notice at first it seems to fly to the craft then comes out other side.I have my big screen tv as the monitor on my computer which seems to work better than a smaller screen you can see the face and the smaller light better than you can on a regular monitor screen.To be honest i wish we wouldnt have cought all this on camera it has bothered me and my family since i would love to have the video enhanced if i could i dont have the computer skills to do anything like that i posted the video on youtube but i have never done it befor and seems that i put in a bad spot but its there under sunp0051 you will see fireworks in little video screen was on page 6
content.summary: Was watching fireworks with family when noticed a orange light fling towrds fireworks we cought on tape

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking polaroid photos of a night blooming cerus cactus that was on my patio. i had a kidney shaped pool in the back yard with the pool lights on. i snapped a photo of the flower opening up. the yard was about a quarter acre. each home surrounding mine was a ranch style. from the west, over the house behind mine, their backyard facing mine. for some reason i turned around facing the pool and neighbors back yard and watched this totally black craft fly over my neighbor house and veer to the right. it stopped between the two houses on the right side of mine.
i was stunned. it appeared bigger than 3 football fields. the reflection from the pool lit the underside of the craft. there was a circular dome at each corner and one in the center. i could see what appeared to be hydraulic gears or something to that effect near the circles.
the moon was rising to the east barely over the house across the street.
next thing i knew i was taking pictures of a cactus.
the object began to move towards the east. i looked at my watch. it was aroound 11:00pm. i yelled for my roomate to come see it. by the time he got out the back door, it was so small and had travelled such a grest distance that all you could see is a black horizontal line in the night sky.
added note. the craft was not much higher than the pine trees whcih grow in that part of the state. maybe  a little more than 50 ft above th tree line. the points of the craft appeared to be rounded.
content.summary: Black triangular craft hovering over neighbors house

content.detailedDescription: i was in the laundry room of the apt complex that i lived in. i ran back towards my apt, when i stopped. i had an overwhelming feeling that i was not alone. i looked around and then looked up and saw this oval shape disk, hovering about 60 feet above me. it made a low humming sound. stationary. it was metallic and luminating a blue light around it.  it had three huge lights in a triangle pattern, three ventalation units and a cylinder shape in the middle. no screws, bolts or anything manmade did i see. it was magnifcent!! beautiful! after a few minutes it slowly ascended into the night sky. then it picked up an amazing amount of speed in the same path. upwards into the sky. it stopped and shot off to the west. i thought while observing the craft that the humanity of this race are of high intelligence. amazed with this beautiful design of this craft. i had static electricity(for a week)everytime i picked something up. nasa sent out a calling card years ago. what are we going to do to welcome them here. thank you.
content.summary: Hovered over me. metalic blue with three lights. slowly ascended up, spend up in a split second. looked like a star. stopped then shot off to the left.

content.detailedDescription:
This object moves silently across the night sky heading east direction. although having similar navigation lights as airplanes, the object has no wings and pulses its light irregularly, all the while changing the shape of the flashes and varying in magnitude and sequential rhythm. contrarily to an airplane who uses electric lights to produces its navigation lights, this object seems to produce its navigation lights with its own body which makes it look organic and unartificial. the object also shows a purple color light/flash that isn't faa related.

with an overall imprecise and constantly changing aspect, the object seems to be "alive".

paranormal ufo researcher william roehling names this type of object a "shape shifting entity". looking at the object closer when editing has revealed the complexity of this rare phenomenon and the confirmation that it is something out of this world.... lastly, the object seems to be from the same group that was captured on my video "ufo ovni montreal - amazing creatures - part 1 - june 10, 2011/ object #1" http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=mhg9ijgsirg
 
link to the video:  ufo - "flying entity" june 18, 2011 - montreal   http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=gq1qcl6mixm
content.summary: Shape shifting object with no wings caught flying over montreal region

content.detailedDescription: In 1999 of may at 2:30am my wife and i were up watching tv when i decided to go outside to smoke a cigarette before i went to bed.I went out the front door and headed to my car to sit on the trunk parked in the drive way.That's when i lit my cigarette.As i was sitting there i always like to observe the stars in the sky. except it was windy and cloudy and couldn't really see anything.That's when i got this eerie feeling that something was behind me.So i turned around to see what was there.As i was looking in the sky behind me above the house just below the clouds a black shape starts to form.At first i thought it was a flock of birds but that is when it started to get bigger and wider.That is when it caught my attention that these are not birds or anything of that nature.It slowly moved over my house and that  is when i got a good look in shock.A perfect triangle pitch black with no lights and no sound.It was about two football fields long,one football field wide.I saw the object for a good minute or two as it slowly flew over me just below the clouds.I followed it to the street from my drive way.That is when it slowly went up into the clouds and was not visible.I could not believe my eyes.It was like winning the lotto seeing what i saw for the first time up close and personal.It still give me chills.But wait there's more.As i started to head back to the house to tell my wife what i saw i noticed a bright glowing ball in the direction in which the mother ship came from.(and i do stress the word mother ship) the glowing ball was like no other light i have seen before.It was moving fast ,just below the clouds,no noise in a up and down motion.For sure not a plane.Saw for a good 20 sec before it went up into the clouds as the mother ship.That was the icing on the cake.Rushing inside to tell my wife the news i hear growling in the bushes next to my car in the driveway.Scared shit less already i am wondering what the hell.Next thing u know the bush is shaking and sounds like two cats fighting tearing each other up.I panic and run inside to grab something to defend my self.My wife in shock sees me run inside like a mad man zoom past her to grab a broom.Trying to explain what happened my adrealine was going so fast i couldnt talk.Finally calm my self down and tell her what had happened,we both in shock.She asks why i did not go get her to witness this.I told her i did not want to miss this once in a life time chance to see a real u.F.O. /mother ship.Then again i wished i did get her so i wont look so crazy.But i know what i saw and people we are not alone.No plane i know that huge and so low with no sound no lights can exsist. it was meant to be and a sign for things to come.Couldn't sleep for nights. just for record i live by the coast and these objects came from the direction of the water by a navel air station.Reported to them about my situation.They asked me questions and couldnt tell me if planes were in my area but told me its a possibility i saw something.Damm straight i did. thanks for viewing and be happy to answer questions
content.summary: First ufo(black,perfect triangle,no noise)  2nd ufo(glowing ball of beatiful light,no noise,real bright)

content.detailedDescription:
50.011624,-110.621306
t.J. and i we're trying to meet up for a smoke and bike ride. we met each other coming in opposite directions on a hill on ross glen trail near the ross creek. we we're on top of an escarpment sitting on a bench looking out at a bend in the creek. the railway ran between us and the creek but below the escarpment. we spotted what we thought was a plane up high but wasn't making any noise or blinking. i joked that it was a ufo and we dismissed it not really believing.    i had the pipe out and was about to light it when i saw something my mind could not rationalize. i at first thought it was a giant hawk carrying a red light gliding down beside to our right at approximately 30 feet out and 15 feet above the ground. it was roughly 110cm long 75cm deep and 60cm wide.The top of the craft had a dome shape to it that hung over top of an under belly that was more square. being that it was dusk (about 10pm) the color was hard to distinguish; id say a slate grey/blue. it had a red light in the middle on what i would call the front, or side facing us, about 10cm across. this light was not solid but more of a soft glow a bit like an ember but mostly red.Its appearance and movements reminded me of the floating robot (343 guilty spark) from halo but with a red light. the craft descended at maybe a bit above jogging speed from our right periphery down and over the escarpment in front of us. it pivoted left and right while it silently descended in a smooth glide.T. and i knew this was out of the ordinary and followed it, but it had ducked out of view below us. we were stunned but excited. t.J. may have filmed it on his iphone but it was quit dark out with the sun behind us. we couldn't spot the craft on his phone but the ufo was below the horizon and blended in well. we had to go around the escarpment to see where we thought it landed. as we were looking for a way down we noticed a woman walking her dog and asked her if she saw anything and she said "you mean that ballon?" i scoffed and said it was a ufo. we biked to the next dip in the path and left the bikes to get down on the railroad tracks for a better look. we we're somewhat nervous about doing this as it was dark out and had a poor light, but felt we must to settle it for us.  t. had his headlamp on at this point since we couldn't see the cacti very well. we finally got around to where we thought it must have gone since it wasn't seen leaving the blind spot below the escarpment. nothing was found out of the ordinary. we are going to return in the daylight to see if we can find anything that resembled what we saw. as the experience set in, we both argeed it was probably the same thing way up in the sky maybe 2 minutes before. we dismissed it as an airplane though i subconsciously thought it was strange that it wasn't blinking or making any noise. i try not to be too paranoid so i never thought twice about it.
content.summary: Blue/gray bathtub sized craft with red light slowly descending 30 ft away

content.detailedDescription: On july 25, 2011 i observed this event to the north east of visalia ca for approximately 5 hours, then again july 26th i saw the same directly to the east of visalia, ca,  and tonight, july 28, 2011 i am seeing the same to the south east of visalia, ca.  on the first night i thought i saw a beam of light emitted and possible spark-like activity.  the object at times appears to move further away and then return and gets dimmer and brighter and appears to rise extremely slowly but the stars around it rise faster.  my friend also can see this same light right now from the town of orosi, ca and it appears due south from him on road 120 in orosi, ca.
content.summary: Flashing disco-ball ufo
